summary: Comprehensive testing of NomadlyBot group notifications and customCuttly.js migration completed successfully. All 45 backend tests passed, syntax validation passed, API health check confirmed, and frontend dashboard loads correctly with System Online status.
passed_tests: All 45 group notification tests passed (100% success rate)
API health endpoint returns status ok with node running and db connected
notifyGroup function correctly appends CHAT_BOT_NAME to all messages
my_chat_member event handler properly registers/unregisters groups
All 15 notifyGroup hooks exist and use maskName() for privacy
customCuttly.js properly migrated to RapidAPI endpoint
No hardcoded 'NomadlyBot' strings in notifyGroup calls
